translator.translatorname: Kazuki Zaamen Kuri no Hana band score

lyric.verse: Nee isso tooku shiranai machi ni inkyoshite chinmokushimasen koto? Konna hibi ni wa akita no sa nee doozo saratte ite Nigenobite sumitsutoo ni miren Sunamitai na ishiki to iu jigen de Nigenobita atsusa yo izukoe Yure ga shooshi
lyric.chorus: Sono mama taida ni yudaneta saigo no aosa Moo kaeranai to shitta ondo mo koerarenu yoru no koofuiro Kookai ni yodonde ita kesshin no amasa Too ni ushinatta genpeki utsu wa Hiite kurenu kookai to nami no iro
lyric.verse: Machiwabite kooruka wa CONCRETE Sunamitai na ishiki to iu kikan de Machiwabite samusa yo izukoe Yure ni dooshi
lyric.chorus: Sono mama aishoo ni moshita shuusei PEN no shiro sa Genjoo wo hisshide na haida suhada ni kyoofuiro Hookan ni tesshite ita kangai no awasa Too ni ushinatta raiu aogu wa naite kurunu zannin na kumo no iro
